msg.msgText:
A "MessageHub" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create MessageHub help imaserver create MessageHub "Name=value" "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create MessageHub "Name=TestMH" "Description=Message Hub"
Configuration items for "MessageHub" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
